scoringPlays.text: Daniel Hamm 3 Yd Run (A.J. Mejia Kick)
Doni Dowling 42 Yd pass from Kurt Benkert (A.J. Mejia Kick)
Jordan Ellis 7 Yd Run (A.J. Mejia Kick)
Olamide Zaccheaus 30 Yd pass from Kurt Benkert (A.J. Mejia Kick)
Hergy Mayala 60 Yd pass from Bryant Shirreffs (Two-Point Run Conversion Failed)
Hergy Mayala 17 Yd pass from Bryant Shirreffs (Two-Point Pass Conversion Failed)
Andre Levrone 73 Yd pass from Kurt Benkert (A.J. Mejia Kick)
Kevin Mensah 30 Yd Run (Two-Point Pass Conversion Failed)

videos.description: Daniel Hamm caps off an 18-play first drive with a 3-yard TD.
videos.headline: Hamm punches it in for Virginia

videos.description: Brenton Nelson intercepts Bryant Shirreffs as the Huskies drive stalls in the red zone.
videos.headline: Nelson picks off Shirreffs in the redzone

videos.description: Doni Dowling blows by the corner for 42-yard TD catch.
videos.headline: Dowling streaks down the sideline for the TD

videos.description: Jordan Ellis busts through a defender for the 7-yard TD  run.
videos.headline: Ellis finds the end zone just before haltime

videos.description: Bronco Mendenhall and the Virginia Cavaliers take a 24-0 lead into the half on the back of the defense.
videos.headline: Mendenhall happy with the defense at the half

videos.description: Kurt Benkert connects with Olamide Zaccheaus for the 30-yard TD pass.
videos.headline: Zaccheaus keeps the momentum going for UVA

videos.description: UConn QB Bryant Shirreffs lines up at WR then tosses a 60-yard TD pass to Hergy Mayala.
videos.headline: UConn uses trickery to get on the board
